intro: Love is in the air, y_c! Have anyone that you.... you know... like?

valen_introspective_H1: [t_c paws at a few plucked flowers, {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} eyes following their_crush around camp.]
I wanted to give these to their_crush but, I don't know.
valen_introspective_H2: One moon, I'll be able to celebrate with their_crush and understand the joy it brings.
valen_introspective_H3: {PRONOUN/y_c/parent}... Did you forget what day it is?
Welllll, t_p has been looking really mad this moon. Are you sure you didn't forget anything?
valen_introspective_H4: I'm going to give flowers to r_k today!
... It's gift a flower moon, right?
valen_shunned_H2: [While everycat is celebrating, t_c sits in a corner away from the commotion.]
valen_shunned_H3: Why are you coming over here to speak to me when you could be celebrating with your precious y_m?
Enjoy it while you still can.
valen_shunned_H4: [t_c gently drops a mouse at your paws.]
Here. I... wanted to get flowers, as usual, but I didn't want to be caught sneaking back into camp. I hope this is okay.
[t_c's ear flickers at the sound of movement and swiftly moves away, out of sight.]
valen_shunned_H5: Don't worry, we can still celebrate together. They can't take that away from us.
valen_shunned_H6: [You watch t_c exchange trinkets with y_m with a burning jealousy.]
valen_shunned_H7: Oh, what are those flowers for? your_crush?
HAH! As if they'd accept them! I'd like to see you try.
valentine_focus_SQ7: [t_c approaches you nervously, holding a tiny yellow flower in {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} mouth.]
I don't think I'm doing this right, but...
Everycat's giving flowers to cats they really like, and you're the bestest sibling ever, so... here!
valentine_focus_SQ2: Hey, y_c, can I ask for some advice?
I really like their_crush, and it feels like now's supposed to be the time to ask {PRONOUN/their_crush/object} to be mates.
But I just... I don't know why, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for that.
Do you think I'm missing my opportunity? Should I go for it anyways?
valentine_focus_SQ3: [You find t_c standing in t_m's nest, decorating it with dozens of meticulously picked petals.]
Oh! H-hi, y_c. Sorry, I know this looks silly.
Actually, could you distract t_m for a bit?
I need to sneak some more petals into camp, and it would be terrible if {PRONOUN/t_m/subject} saw me! That would completely ruin the surprise!
valentine_focus_SQ4: [You're surprised to see t_c up at dawn, trotting towards the edge of camp. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/pause/pauses} when you ask where {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} going.]
Well... Everycat's getting gifts for their mates, so of course I need to find something good for t_m!
There's a patch of blue flowers where we used to go and talk, so I thought I'd bring {PRONOUN/t_m/object} some.
But last night I was thinking... what if someone got to them first? Or what if they didn't bloom this year? Or... I don't know... something ate them?
So I need to go check! And if they're gone, I'll need to think of something else, quick!
valentine_focus_SQ5: [t_c sounds uncharacteristically determined. You turn. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} right behind you.]
You should ask your_crush to be your mate.
Believe me, I know it's intimidating! But it's obvious you like {PRONOUN/your_crush/object}, and I can tell {PRONOUN/your_crush/subject} {VERB/your_crush/like/likes} you too.
I... I'm sorry, was that too forward? I just...
You deserve to be happy, y_c. At least think about it, okay?
valentine_focus_SQ6: [You find t_c diligently inspecting a bundle of newly picked flowers. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/stick/sticks} {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} nose into several before noticing you.]
Oh, y_c! I know this looks weird.
I'm just checking these flowers before I give them to t_m. I don't want any bees to be hiding inside... what if they stung {PRONOUN/t_m/object}?
valenfocus_gen_1ps: It's so nice to see the Clan in such high spirits!
I could do without the lovey-doveyness of everycat, though.
valenfocus_gen_2ps: What day is it again? Why is everycat...
Oh! I forgot! I need to get t_m flowers!
[You watch t_c rush off, t_m laughing and shaking {PRONOUN/t_m/poss} head affectionately.]
valenfocus_gen_3ps: Hey you! I got you flowers!!
[Your mate presses {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} head into your shoulder lovingly, a purr erupting from {PRONOUN/t_c/object}.]
[Until you hear r_k wrinkle {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} nose and call you two gross. t_c bursts into soft laughter.]
valenfocus_gen_4ps: Hi y_c! I'm decorating the camp.
Do you think you could help real quick? I just need that over there.
valentine_focus_J1: [When you trot over to t_c, you see that {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/have/has} a small flower in between {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} forepaws. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} glancing around, apparently not wanting anycat else to see it.]
Since the flowers are blooming and everything, I wanted to give this flower to their_crush, but... I don't know, is that stupid?
Have you seen them lately? What if some other cat has been giving {PRONOUN/their_crush/object} flowers today?
[You encourage t_c to give it a shot. 'Tis the season, after all!]
Hhhh... Okay, I will. But if this blows up in my face, I'm blaming you.
valentine_focus_J2: Ah, love is in the air, isn't it, y_c?
All of the single cats scrambling around to find someone... It makes me glad we've figured it out already!
valentine_focus_J3: Oh, nothing, y_c. It's grown-up stuff.
It's just that it's newleaf, and I'm thinking of telling their_crush that I like {PRONOUN/t_c/object}. I don't know, though.
Again, it's grown-up stuff. You won't have to worry about it for a while.
valentine_focus_AJ1: [t_c bounds up to you, battered and bruised and somehow soaking wet, with a huge grin plastered on {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} face.]
Happy couples' season, babe! I got you this gift!
[t_c places a half-wilted flower at your paws.]
I spotted it at the edge of the territory and just knew it would be perfect for you!
And all I had to do was cross two rivers, then scale up the side of this cliff!
I, ah ... Might've slipped a little bit on the way down. But I did my best to keep it intact for you!
[The flower is missing half of its petals, the stem is snapped in two places, and its leaves are coming off.]
[It's torn up, bruised, and weathered ... but still beautiful. Just like your t_c.]
valentine_focus_AJ2: y_c! It's couples' season! Don't you know what that means?
Now's the perfect time to confess how you feel to your_crush!!!
Ahh, I can practically see it now ... a breeze in the air, a song in the sky, the flowering trees in full bloom overhead ...
C'mon, don't be nervous! You gotta go talk to {PRONOUN/your_crush/object} now, before you miss your chance!
Do you need any help? Wait right here, I'll go grab {PRONOUN/your_crush/object} for you.
[Oh no - better run, quick, before t_c forces you to confess!]
valentine_focus_AJ3: [t_c is making a huge commotion in the middle of camp.]
Ahem, may all cats of c_nClan gather for a Clan meeting ... on why t_m is the best mate ever!
Reason number one: {PRONOUN/t_m/subject}{VERB/t_m/'re/'s}, like, the smartest cat in the whole world.
Reason number two: {PRONOUN/t_m/subject} can always find a way to make me laugh.
Reason number three: {PRONOUN/t_m/subject}{VERB/t_m/'re/'s} more beautiful than the stars themselves!
[As t_c continues with {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} speech, t_m hides shyly behind {PRONOUN/t_m/poss} paws, looking thrilled, if a little mortified at all the attention.]
valentine_focus_AJ4: [All moon, t_c has been complaining about couples' season.]
It's just such an idiotic concept. Who cares about stupid couples bringing each other banal, junky gifts when we have actual things we could be doing?
[Still, at the end of your duties one night, you discover a small gift inside your nest: a beautiful, shiny pebble, covered in t_c's scent.]
[Seems like someone's not so immune to the season, after all.]
valentine_focus_AJ5: [t_c has amassed a massive pile of gifts from all their secret admirers: flowers, feathers, gleaming stones and shells, choice cuts of prey.]
[They laze around their nest, batting around a dazzling, bright blue feather that must have come from an especially smitten devotee.]
Oh, hey, y_c. Come to share in the spoils?
I guess this holiday isn't so useless after all ... Hehe.
valentine_focus_AJ6: [t_c slides a small, heart-shaped rock towards you.]
I know we're not actually a couple, but ... Who's to say love has to be romantic?
I think the two of us make a pretty good pair. And that deserves to be celebrated, too!
valentine_focus_AJ7: Sigh ... Another couples' season, tragically single.
What's the deal, StarClan? I thought for sure I would've found someone by now!
Just you wait, though, y_c. Next year is gonna be my year, for sure.
Who knows? Maybe their_crush and I could be together by then!
Ah, maybe I shouldn't be saying stuff like that out loud ... I don't wanna jinx it.
valentine_focus_AJ8: All my life, I've thought that couples' season is a stupid, pointless holiday.
But, ah, now that I get to celebrate it with you ...
valentine_focus_AJ9: [t_c observes all the couples around camp with a disgusted expression.]
Echh. If you need me, I'll be in my nest.
valentine_focus_AJ10: Everycat getting all sappy around camp ... Really, it's enough to make you sick!
So, uh ... y-you don't like anyone in particular, do you?
I mean, I know I certainly don't! Hehehe!
[t_c flushes and quickly looks away. Right. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} definitely {VERB/t_c/don't/doesn't} like anyone.]
valentine_focus_AJ11: y_c, am I gonna be part of a ... 'couple' when I grow up?
[You tell t_c that {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} can do whatever makes {PRONOUN/t_c/object} happy, but it's very possible that {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}'ll meet someone and fall in love.]
I never wanna fall in love! I just wanna battle!
valentine_focus_AJ12: Wahhh! It's not fair! Why is everycat in c_nClan getting a pretty gift except for me?
[You explain to t_c that it's a special time where cats are celebrating their mates, and {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}'ll get to have a gift some other time.]
How do I get a 'mate', then?
valentine_focus_AJ13: Tch. If I ever start acting like some of these sappy mouse-brains, feel free to smack me across the face.
[You ask t_c if that includes the way {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/act/acts} around their_crush.]
W-What? their_crush? Ah - Who told you that?
valentine_focus_AJ14: [t_c presents t_m with a sweet gift! t_m swoons and collapses into t_c's pelt.]
[Your baby and {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} 'baby' seem so happy together!]
valentine_focus_AJ15: [You playfully tease t_c about how the newleaf season has you in the mood for romance, pressing your weight into {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} side.]
No, don't do this to me, y_c. I swore to myself that I would never become one of those saccharine, obnoxious, lovey-dovey couples during newleaf. I refuse!
[You press more and more of your weight into t_c's side until the two of you collapse, rolling and laughing.]
Now, look what you've turned me into! I've totally lost my edge! Hahaha!
valentine_focus_AJ155: Ah, newleaf! What a time to be alive.
The sun is shining, the birds are chirping, and young heartthrobs everywhere are confessing their love ...
... If you need me, I'll be off puking somewhere.
valentine_focus_AJ16: I swear if another newleaf goes by without us finding love, it has to be some sort of punishment from StarClan.
You and I are total catches! But what's it gonna take for your_crush and their_crush to see it?
Hey, I know! Maybe you and I could flirt with each others' crushes to make them jealous! Wanna?
valentine_focus_AJ17: [t_c has amassed a massive pile of gifts from all of {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} secret admirers: flowers, feathers, gleaming stones and shells, choice cuts of prey.]
Oh, hey, squirt. You wanna play with some of this junk?
Yeah, it's what happens every year. I never end up using any of it, but I'm sure some of it would make a great toy for a pipsqueak like you!
[Delightedly, you select a cool fossil from the top of the pile. Somewhere across camp, one of t_c's admirers is heartbroken.]
valentine_focus_Guy1: [t_c trots over to you, shaking a tuft of fur from {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} claws in the process.]
Oh, don't worry about that - I found the prettiest feather in all the Clans for you!
Well, obviously since it's the best, someone else wanted it... but I'm the greatest, so I won it!
valentines_focus_J4: [t_c collapses at your paws, dropping the bundle of dandelions {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}'d picked up.]
I was gonna give these to their_crush, like you said I should, but {PRONOUN/their_crush/subject}{VERB/their_crush/'re/'s} talking with someone else! I think it's over, y_c, I can't do this.
valentines_focus_J5: [You turn to see t_c nosing a shiny stone in your direction.]
I found this by the riverbed. You should give it to your_crush. {PRONOUN/your_crush/subject/CAP}'ll love it, I promise.
What? Oh, come on, it's obvious you like {PRONOUN/your_crush/object}. Just do it, chicken!
valentines_focus_J6: I wonder if I should have kits some day...
Do you think their_crush thinks so?
What? No, I mean, just-- {PRONOUN/their_crush/subject} {VERB/their_crush/seem/seems} like {PRONOUN/their_crush/subject}'d be good at raising them!
And look at {PRONOUN/their_crush/poss} pelt! {PRONOUN/their_crush/poss/CAP} kits would be beautiful.
No, I'm not saying {PRONOUN/their_crush/subject} {VERB/their_crush/look/looks} beautiful! Just that... {PRONOUN/their_crush/poss} fur is...
valentines_focus_J7: [t_c drops a small bundle of wildflowers at your paws.]
Picked 'em just for you! Do you like them?
velentines_focus_J8: [When you turn, you see t_c approaching with a stone in {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} jaws. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/set/sets} it down in front of you.]
Everycat is getting each other gifts, so, I thought I'd get you one, too.
Sorry, I can't tell if it looks pretty, but I picked the smoothest one I could find!
[t_c's stone isn't as shiny or colourful as the gifts most other cats have been getting, but you think it's the best of all of them.]
valentines_focus_J9: [You approach t_c with a gift-- a bundle of pretty feathers and plants tied together with grass.]
[When {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/see/sees} you, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/beam/beams}, gratefully accepting and giving you a lick on the cheek.]
[Though t_c doesn't speak, {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} purrs make {PRONOUN/t_c/object} the loudest cat in camp!]
